description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the out of bounds write vulnerability in Chromium that affects Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based):

1. Ensure you are running the latest version of Microsoft Edge.
2. To check your version, open your Microsoft Edge browser, click on the 3 dots (...) at the top right corner.
3. Select 'Help and feedback' and then 'About Microsoft Edge' to verify your current version.
4. If your version is not 120.0.2210.144 or higher, update your browser to this version or later.

**Details**:
- This update addresses CVE-2024-0517 and ensures your Microsoft Edge browser is no longer vulnerable.
- For more information regarding this CVE, please refer to the [Google Chrome releases](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2024).
